mapper.sql: F_ID, F_SEND_TYPE, F_LOGISTICS, F_PAYMENT_TIME, F_PAYMENT_SOURCE, F_EXAMINE, F_XQ_TC_MONEY, F_DQ_TC_MONEY, F_POLICY_TIME, F_POLICY_USER_NAME, F_POLICY_USER_ID, F_POLICY_INTRO2, F_ISPOLICY, F_POLICY_INTRO, F_SOURCE_ID, F_ISEDITPRICE, F_TOWNSHIP, F_YAOFNAG, F_CUSTOMER_ID, F_NAME, F_ADDRESS, F_PHONE, F_SALE_TIME, F_SALE_USER_ID, F_SALE_USER_NAME, F_FINANCE_TIME, F_FINANCE_USER_ID, F_FINANCE_USER_NAME, F_SHIPPER_TIME, F_SHIPPER_USER_ID, F_SHIPPER_USER_NAME, F_EXPRESS_ID, F_EXPRESS_NAME, F_STATE, F_MONEY, F_GUOJIFEI, F_FANDIAN, F_GAOKAIFEI, F_TAX, F_MONEY_NOTAX, F_MONEY_BUYINGPRICE, F_SALE_INTRO, F_FINANCE_INTRO, F_SHIPPER_INTRO, F_PAYMENT_STATE, F_TIME
mapper.select:
select count(1) from t_order where 1=1
and F_NAME like CONCAT("%",#{fName} ,"%")
SELECT F_ID, F_TIME, F_SALE_TIME FROM t_order where F_STATE=#{fState}

select count(1) from t_order where F_SALE_USER_ID in (${userId}) and F_STATE in(0,1,2,3,4,8,9) AND F_ISEDITPRICE in(0,1) and F_ISPOLICY != 3
and F_NAME like CONCAT("%",#{fName} ,"%")

select count(1) from t_order where F_SALE_USER_ID in (${userId}) and F_STATE in(0,1,2,3,4,8,9) AND F_ISEDITPRICE in(0,1) and F_ISPOLICY = 3
and F_NAME like CONCAT("%",#{fName} ,"%")

select count(1) from t_order a LEFT JOIN t_customer b ON a.F_CUSTOMER_ID=b.F_ID where a.F_STATE in(10,1,2,3) and a.F_ISPOLICY=1
and b.F_UNIT like CONCAT("%",#{fName} ,"%")
and a.F_SALE_USER_NAME like CONCAT("%",#{fCustomName} ,"%")

SELECT a.F_ID, a.F_ADDRESS, a.F_CUSTOMER_ID, a.F_NAME, a.F_PHONE, a.F_SALE_TIME, a.F_SALE_USER_ID, a.F_SALE_USER_NAME, a.F_FINANCE_TIME, a.F_FINANCE_USER_ID, a.F_FINANCE_USER_NAME, a.F_SHIPPER_TIME, a.F_SHIPPER_USER_ID, a.F_SHIPPER_USER_NAME, a.F_EXPRESS_ID, a.F_EXPRESS_NAME, a.F_STATE, a.F_MONEY_NOTAX, a.F_MONEY, a.F_GUOJIFEI, a.F_FANDIAN, a.F_GAOKAIFEI, a.F_TAX, a.F_TIME, a.F_SALE_INTRO, a.F_FINANCE_INTRO, a.F_SHIPPER_INTRO, a.F_TOWNSHIP, a.F_YAOFNAG, a.F_ISPOLICY, a.F_POLICY_INTRO, b.F_NAME F_CUSTOMER_NAME, b.F_UNIT FROM t_order a LEFT JOIN t_customer b ON a.F_CUSTOMER_ID=b.F_ID where a.F_STATE in(10,1,2,3) and a.F_ISPOLICY=1
and b.F_UNIT like CONCAT("%",#{fName} ,"%")
and a.F_SALE_USER_NAME like CONCAT("%",#{fCustomName} ,"%")
order by a.F_ID desc LIMIT #{page}, #{rows}

select count(1) from t_order a LEFT JOIN t_customer b ON a.F_CUSTOMER_ID=b.F_ID where F_ISEDITPRICE in(0,2)
and b.F_UNIT like CONCAT("%",#{fName} ,"%")
and a.F_SALE_USER_NAME like CONCAT("%",#{fCustomName} ,"%")
and a.F_STATE in(#{fState})
and a.F_PAYMENT_STATE in(#{fPaymentState})

SELECT a.F_ID, a.F_EXAMINE, a.F_ADDRESS, a.F_CUSTOMER_ID, a.F_NAME, a.F_PHONE, a.F_SALE_TIME, a.F_SALE_USER_ID, a.F_SALE_USER_NAME, a.F_FINANCE_TIME, a.F_FINANCE_USER_ID, a.F_FINANCE_USER_NAME, a.F_SHIPPER_TIME, a.F_SHIPPER_USER_ID, a.F_SHIPPER_USER_NAME, a.F_PAYMENT_STATE, a.F_EXPRESS_ID, a.F_EXPRESS_NAME, a.F_STATE, a.F_MONEY_NOTAX, a.F_MONEY_BUYINGPRICE, a.F_MONEY, a.F_GUOJIFEI, a.F_FANDIAN, a.F_GAOKAIFEI, a.F_TAX, a.F_TIME, a.F_SALE_INTRO, a.F_FINANCE_INTRO, a.F_SHIPPER_INTRO, a.F_TOWNSHIP, a.F_YAOFNAG, a.F_ISPOLICY, a.F_POLICY_INTRO, a.F_XQ_TC_MONEY, a.F_DQ_TC_MONEY, b.F_NAME F_CUSTOMER_NAME, b.F_UNIT FROM t_order a LEFT JOIN t_customer b ON a.F_CUSTOMER_ID=b.F_ID where F_ISEDITPRICE in(0,2)
and b.F_UNIT like CONCAT("%",#{fName} ,"%")
and a.F_SALE_USER_NAME like CONCAT("%",#{fCustomName} ,"%")
and a.F_STATE in(#{fState})
and a.F_PAYMENT_STATE in(#{fPaymentState})
order by a.F_ID desc LIMIT #{page}, #{rows}

select count(1) from t_order a LEFT JOIN t_customer b ON a.F_CUSTOMER_ID=b.F_ID where a.F_STATE in(2,3) AND F_ISEDITPRICE in(0,2)
and b.F_UNIT like CONCAT("%",#{fName} ,"%")
and a.F_SALE_USER_NAME like CONCAT("%",#{fCustomName} ,"%")
and a.F_PAYMENT_STATE in(#{fPaymentState})
and a.F_EXAMINE in(#{fExamine})

SELECT a.F_ID, a.F_EXAMINE, a.F_ADDRESS, a.F_CUSTOMER_ID, a.F_PAYMENT_STATE, a.F_NAME, a.F_PHONE, a.F_SALE_TIME, a.F_SALE_USER_ID, a.F_SALE_USER_NAME, a.F_FINANCE_TIME, a.F_FINANCE_USER_ID, a.F_FINANCE_USER_NAME, a.F_SHIPPER_TIME, a.F_SHIPPER_USER_ID, a.F_SHIPPER_USER_NAME, a.F_EXPRESS_ID, a.F_EXPRESS_NAME, a.F_STATE, a.F_MONEY, a.F_GUOJIFEI, a.F_FANDIAN, a.F_GAOKAIFEI, a.F_TAX, a.F_TIME, a.F_SALE_INTRO, a.F_FINANCE_INTRO, a.F_SHIPPER_INTRO, b.F_NAME F_CUSTOMER_NAME, b.F_UNIT FROM t_order a LEFT JOIN t_customer b ON a.F_CUSTOMER_ID=b.F_ID where a.F_STATE in(2,3) AND F_ISEDITPRICE in(0,2)
and b.F_UNIT like CONCAT("%",#{fName} ,"%")
and a.F_SALE_USER_NAME like CONCAT("%",#{fCustomName} ,"%")
and a.F_PAYMENT_STATE in(#{fPaymentState})
and a.F_EXAMINE in(#{fExamine})
order by a.F_ID desc LIMIT #{page}, #{rows}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_order
F_ID,
F_SOURCE_ID,
F_NAME,
F_STATE,
F_CUSTOMER_ID,
F_ADDRESS,
F_PHONE,
F_SALE_TIME,
F_SALE_USER_ID,
F_SALE_USER_NAME,
F_MONEY,
F_TAX,
F_TIME,
F_GUOJIFEI,
F_FANDIAN,
F_GAOKAIFEI,
F_MONEY_NOTAX,
F_MONEY_BUYINGPRICE,
F_YAOFNAG,
F_TOWNSHIP,
F_ISEDITPRICE,
F_ISPOLICY,
F_POLICY_INTRO,
F_XQ_TC_MONEY,
F_DQ_TC_MONEY,
F_PAYMENT_SOURCE,
F_PAYMENT_STATE,
F_EXAMINE,
#{fId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fSourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fCustomerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{fAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
UPDATE t_order
F_SEND_TYPE = #{fSendType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
F_LOGISTICS = #{fLogistics,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_PAYMENT_SOURCE = #{fPaymentSource,jdbcType=INTEGER},
F_PAYMENT_TIME = #{fPaymentTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_TIME = #{fTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_STATE = #{fState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_ISEDITPRICE = #{fIsEditPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_SALE_TIME = #{fSaleTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_SALE_USER_ID = #{fSaleUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
F_SALE_USER_NAME = #{fSaleUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_FINANCE_TIME = #{fFinanceTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_FINANCE_USER_ID = #{fFinanceUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
F_FINANCE_USER_NAME = #{fFinanceUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_SHIPPER_TIME = #{fShipperTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_SHIPPER_USER_ID = #{fShipperUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
F_SHIPPER_USER_NAME = #{fShipperUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_EXPRESS_ID = #{fExpressId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_EXPRESS_NAME = #{fExpressName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_PAYMENT_STATE = #{fPaymentState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_SHIPPER_INTRO = #{fShipperIntro,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_FINANCE_INTRO = #{fFinanceIntro,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_SALE_INTRO = #{fSaleIntro,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_GUOJIFEI = #{fGuoJiFei,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
F_FANDIAN = #{fFanDian,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
F_GAOKAIFEI = #{fGaoKaiFei,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
F_MONEY_NOTAX = #{fMoney_noTax,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
F_MONEY_BUYINGPRICE = #{fMoney_buyingPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
F_MONEY = #{fMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
F_NAME = #{fName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_CUSTOMER_ID = #{fCustomerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
F_ADDRESS = #{fAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_PHONE = #{fPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_TAX = #{fTax,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_YAOFNAG = #{fYaofang,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_TOWNSHIP = #{fTownship,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_ISPOLICY = #{isPolicy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_POLICY_INTRO = #{fPolicyIntro,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_POLICY_TIME = #{fPolicyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_POLICY_INTRO2 = #{fPolicyIntro2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_POLICY_USER_ID = #{fPolicyUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
F_POLICY_USER_NAME = #{fPolicyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_XQ_TC_MONEY = #{fXqTc_Money,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
F_DQ_TC_MONEY = #{fDqTc_Money,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
WHERE F_ID = #{fId}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.F_ID, a.F_USER_CODE ,b.F_MONEY, b.F_MONEY_BUYINGPRICE, b.F_MONEY_NOTAX, b.F_TIME FROM t_user_info a LEFT JOIN t_order b ON a.F_ID=b.F_SALE_USER_ID WHERE a.F_USER_ROLE_REL='yewuyuan'
and a.F_USER_CODE like concat('%', #{fName}, '%')
and b.F_TIME like concat('', #{fTime}, '%')

SELECT a.F_ID, a.F_NAME, a.F_ADDRESS, a.F_SPECIFICATION, b.F_NUMBER, b.F_NUMBER_BAK, b.F_STATE, b.F_BALANCE_ID, b.F_BUYING_PRICE, b.F_PRICE FROM t_drug_only a LEFT JOIN t_drug b ON a.F_ID=b.F_DRUG_ONLY_ID where b.F_STATE != 1
and a.F_NAME like concat('%', #{fName}, '%')
and b.F_TIME like concat('', #{fTime}, '%')

SELECT b.F_DRUG_ONLY_ID, b.F_NAME, a.F_NUMBER, o.F_TIME FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_detail a ON o.F_ID=a.F_ORDER_ID JOIN t_drug b ON a.F_DRUG_ID=b.F_ID where o.F_STATE in (0,1,2,3,10) AND o.F_ISEDITPRICE in(0,2)
and b.F_NAME like concat('%', #{fName}, '%')
and o.F_TIME like concat('', #{fTime}, '%')
select from t_order where F_ID=#{fId}
select from t_order where F_ID=#{fOrderId}
mapper.update: update t_order set F_EXAMINE=1 WHERE F_ID = #{fId}
